contentrichtext.text: '''''The Book of Lies''''' may refer to: '''In Literature/Writing''' * ''[[The Book of Lies (Crowley)|The Book of Lies]]'' by Aleister Crowley, first published in London in 1913. (ISBN 0-87728-516-0) * ''[[The Penguin Book of Lies]]'' (1991), edited by Philip Kerr, a book of essays on falsehoods told by twentieth-century figures in high places, including Eisenhower, Kennedy, Johnson and Nixon (ISBN 0-670-82560-3) * ''[[The Book of Lies: History's Greatest Fakes, Frauds, Schemes, and Scams]]'' (1991) by [[M. Hirsh Goldberg]] (ISBN 0-688-10743-5) * ''[[The Book of Lies (Kristof novel)|The Book of Lies]]'' (1997) by [[Agota Kristof]] about the ravages of war as seen through the eyes of a pair of twins in wartime Europe. * ''[[The Book of Lies (Picano novel)|The Book of Lies]]'' (1999) by [[Felice Picano]] (ISBN 1-55583-592-9) * ''[[The Burgess Book of Lies]]'' (1999) by [[Adrian Burgess|Adrian]] and [[Alan Burgess (mountaineer)|Alan Burgess]], book of tall tales and true by a pair of identical twin mountain climbers. (ISBN 0-89886-641-3) * ''[[The Book of Lies: The Disinformation Guide to Magick and the Occult]]'' (2003), edited by [[Richard Metzger]], a collection of essays on black arts and the occult. (ISBN 0-9713942-7-X) * ''[[The Book of Lies (Moloney novel)|The Book of Lies]]'' (2004) by James Moloney, a fantasy novel (ISBN 0-00-714079-7) *''[[The Book of Lies (Meltzer novel)|The Book of Lies]]'' (2008) by Brad Meltzer, a thriller novel (ISBN 978-0-446-57788-5) '''In Music''' * ''[[Book of Lies (album)|Book of Lies]]'', an album by Australian band [[End of Fashion]] * "[[The Book of Lies (song)|The Book of Lies]]", a song by the deathrock band [[Christian Death]] included in ''The Path of Sorrows'' (1993). * ''[[The Book of Lies (album)|The Book of Lies]]'', an album by French band [[Jack the Ripper (band)]]. {{disambiguation}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Book of Lies, The}}
